people.description: He's very patriotic and has an angry face, he's very aggressive in the way he responds and stays on the defensive.

interactions.text: Privet ! Me no cheating, me training whole life to serve motherland.

choices.value: You seem to be defensive. Why are you stressed ?
Why did you participate in these olympic games ?
Do you have information about potential cheaters during the event ?
Did you know it was possible to smuggle items into the locker-room ?

interactions.text: I'm not stressed ! You have no right to accuse me ! I passed all the anti-doping tests. Russia have always been honest. Not like other countries...

choices.value: What do you mean ? You think other countries are dishonest ?

interactions.text: Me had no choice. I have always been good at cycling. I was convinced to represent my country.

choices.value: What would happen to you if you came home without a medal ?

interactions.text: I finished second
Yes, I'm convinced The Netherlands cheated. How could they beat me otherwise ?

choices.value: Do you have any evidence for these accusations ?

interactions.text: Of course they are ! They're jealous they can't compete with us ! They have to cheat to beat us it's obvious. There is no way The Netherlands beat us without cheating. I'm 100% sure they took drugs or something.
I... I'd rather not think about that.
What ?! You think I'm a liar ?? You want me to punch you in the face ?
Yes I saw the Dutch trying to hide electronics stuff into the room. These guys are really good with electronics but they sell it at a very high price

people.description: Bjorn Seam is a hedonist, always happy, always smiling from ear to ear. Very nice, but a real pain in the arse.

interactions.text: Hallo, Are you here for an autograph from today's winner? Hahaha just jokin' what d' you want ?

choices.value: Congratulations for your first place you must be very proud
Have you heard rumors about cheaters during these Olympics Games ?

interactions.text: Yeees indeed I am. You would be too if you were me. Imagine how it feels to finally win after years of trainin'. In fact I started trainin' when I was very young. I still remember that time when I trained during 12 hours straight.
Cheaters? Olympics Games are a noble event, I don't think any participant would dare to cheat. This idea seems ridiculous to me.
What? Me.

people.description: Marcello comes from the town of Inferno in Italy. He used to sell bananas from his flat before starting his sporting career. He's a businessman, always looking for loopholes in the rules to exploit.

interactions.text: Ciao what do you want from me ?

choices.value: Have you ever participated in the Olympics Games?
Do you think someone could have cheat during the competition ?
Where does your information about the security of the event come from?

interactions.text: No it was my first time competing in an international competition. An unforgettable experience if you want my feedback.

choices.value: You did very well for a first experience. Third place it's not easy for everyone.

interactions.text: Yes of course you're right. It was far from free, I had to train a lot to achieve this result. But I'm convinced that hard work can lead you to incredible performances.
Yes but I hate cheating I would never consider it.
Since I started from nothing it took me 4 years to be ready
Mmmh to be honest yes, it is definitely a possibility. The controls were were not that strict. Someone could have smuggle cheating materials into the lock-rooms

choices.value: That would be all, thank you [leave]

interactions.text: Hum I don't know. I'm just used to this kind of event and usually athletes are more supervised

people.description: Karl Ackermann was gold medallist at the previous edition of the Olympics Games. He is therefore very disappointed with his performance. After several years in first place, you can imagine that Karl wanted to give it his all to stay there.

interactions.text: Leave me alone

choices.value: Do you think your defeat could be cause by cheat ?

interactions.text: Mmh yeah could be. I heard security was not great this year.
